title: Blurr Images due to moisture at Camera Glass. This happen after 2-3min of Cameara usage
content:
Getting blur images after 2-3 min of Camera usage. It is found that moisture get accumulate on Camera Glass. Moisture will wanish within minute after camera usage.  This happen only during or after rain. During sunny day this issue not found.
As per my knowledge phone never experience water splash. This is happening during or after every rain. Difficult to capture moisture on photo, but refer below images
